review:
Initially I was in a panic about receiving dental treatment but the doctor is patients friendly and treated me with ease and comfort. 
He explained me everything in detail and the doctor is true to his words in delivering the best treatment without any pain.

Dr. Suhas is known for his exceptional skill and expertise in endodontics. Patients consistently praise his gentle approach and thorough explanations, which help alleviate any anxieties about dental procedures. He is dedicated to using the latest technology and techniques to ensure precise and effective treatments. Dr. Suhas's compassionate care and commitment to patient well-being make him a trusted choice for those needing specialized dental care.
The doctor is very soft spoken, empathetic *** ************** The treatment was smooth and painless. **** ****** ** *** ****.

Highly skilled endodontist with high dedication  and patient friendly Doctor 
Highly recommended endodontist in Hyderabad and vishakapatnam
